quiz.text: Which one of the following choices is the only one that could be used as a variable name?
Which of the following will call the move function?
function birthday(age){         age = age + 1;    }; Which term above is the parameter?
function subtract(x, y){         return x - y;    }; Using the function above, which variable below will have the right value?
var a = 6 + 2;    var b =  a * 2;    var c = b / 4;    var d = c * 3;Which variable has a value of 12?
var apples = 15;    var greenApples = 5;    var redApples = Which expression below should complete the last line of the code above?
Which of the following values is a string?
var firstName = 'Abby'    var lastName = 'Gomez'    var fullName = firstName + lastNameWhat is the value of fullName?
var age = 30;    var vote = age > 18;What is the value of vote?
var length = 5;    var width = 2;    var area = length * width;    if (area < 10) {         var price = 50;    } else {        var price = 75;    }; What is the value of price?
